body: I'm implementing this now, I should be posting a pull request within a week or so!

hi @jordanrmerrick, are you still working in this?
I am! Finishing finals in school took more time than I anticipated so progress has been slower, but I'm submitting a PR tioday or tomorrow.
@mloning Can I work on this issue?
I think this has already been implemented in PR #198. @mloning, please confirm. If this PR fulfil the objectives of this issue, I suggest we should close it.

They mentioned the same paper in its documentation that's why I asked. I will have a look into it again. 
@mloning how you want AutoTheta to be implemented. Shall I implement it as an independent function or shall I update the Theta method itself?
